Class netscape.application.FoundationPanel 

netscape.application.FoundationPanel
public class FoundationPanel
java.awt.Panel subclass that glues the IFC View-based world to the AWT component-based world. Each Application has at least one FoundationPanel instance. If you use ExternalWindows, you'll have an additional instance per Window. You'll rarely access a FoundationPanel directly - instead you'll work with an Application or RootView.

See Also:
Application, RootView

FoundationPanel()
Constructs a FoundationPanel with a RootView.
FoundationPanel(int, int)
Constructs a FoundationPanel and RootView of a specified size.

gotFocus(Event, Object)
Overridden to force the focused View to start editing.
keyDown(Event, int)
Overridden to add a KeyEvent of type KeyEvent.KEY_DOWN to the Application's EventLoop.
keyUp(Event, int)
Overridden to add a KeyEvent of type KeyEvent.KEY_UP to the Application's EventLoop.

Overridden to force the focused View to stop editing.

Overridden to add a MouseEvent of type MouseEvent.MOUSE_DOWN to the Application's EventLoop.

Overridden to add a MouseEvent of type MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED to the Application's EventLoop.

Overridden to add a MouseEvent of type MouseEvent.MOUSE_ENTERED to the Application's EventLoop.
mouseExit(Event, int, int)
Overridden to add a MouseEvent of type MouseEvent.MOUSE_EXITED to the Application's EventLoop.
mouseMove(Event, int, int)
Overridden to add a MouseEvent of type MouseEvent.MOUSE_MOVED to the Application's EventLoop.
mouseUp(Event, int, int)
Overridden to add a MouseEvent of type MouseEvent.MOUSE_UP to the Application's EventLoop.
paint(Graphics)
Paints the Panel by eventually calling redraw() on the RootView.
printAll(Graphics)
reshape(int, int, int, int)
Overridden to resize the RootView when the FoundationPanel changes size.
resize(int, int)
Overridden to resize the RootView when the FoundationPanel changes size.
rootView()
Returns the Panel's RootView, the View that sits at the top of the View hierarchy.
setCursor(int)

Sets the Panel's RootView.

                        int height)
Constructs a FoundationPanel and RootView of a specified size.

rootView

Returns the Panel's RootView, the View that sits at the top of the View hierarchy.
